controllers

Class PaceMakerAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.PaceMakerAPI

  • public class PaceMakerAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by annadowling on 23/09/2016. PaceMakerAPI Class contains methods which are used in the adding and retrieving of data used by the command set.

        Returns:

      • addActivity

        public Activity addActivity(java.lang.Long userId,
                            java.lang.String type,
                            java.lang.String location,
                            double distance,
                            java.lang.String starttime,
                            java.lang.String duration)
        Parameters:
        Long - userId, String type, String location, double distance, String starttime, String duration
        Returns:
        Activity Creates a new activity object using the specified paramaters. Checks if the user is present which we want to add the activity to. adds this acitivty to the users activities. adds this activity to the Map activityIndex

      • addLocation

        public void addLocation(java.lang.Long activityId,
                        float latitude,
                        float longitude)
        Parameters:
        Long - activityId, float latitude, float longitude Creates a new location object using the specified paramaters. Checks if the activity is present which we want to add the location to. adds this location to the activity instance (route)

        Parameters:
        File - file Loads a file contents into memory using Xstream Creates an createObjectInputStream of type FileReader Reads the indexMaps into memory. Finally close the stream.
